description:
Unhappy girl Michi makes her way through the crowds of the Oedo Line`s Shinjuku station only to find herself on the Miracle Train. The stations run into trouble when Michi demands to be let off the train after hearing the conductor`s explanation. With her policy of strictly following her life plan, Michi refuses to participate in unexpected activities. When Michi is told her well organized life resembles the accurate subway schedules, she says she hates trains. Shinjuku takes Michi out into the city to find the root of her problem.
Source: crunchyroll
